## ChangeImpact type

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The semantic effect of the change. Critical for variance-aware policies (read-only vs write-only APIs). Required for all 'modified' actions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ChangeImpact = 'widening' | 'narrowing' | 'equivalent' | 'unrelated' | 'undetermined';
```
